ac58edec-9a9d-43c7-8736-7ac24daf6cdc:
Choose one type of weapon (including {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strike{/g}) for which you possess the Weapon Specialization {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with the chosen weapon are more devastating than normal.
Benefit: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} you make using the selected weapon. This bonus to damage stacks with other damage roll bonuses, including any you gain from Weapon Specialization.
Special: You can gain Greater Weapon Specialization multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon.
